title: Very Captivating Res Lease in Austin. 2 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Lovely 1 story, 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo in The Woodlands community available for you to lease!
You will love everything this home has to offer, such as vaulted ceilings, wood grain floors, a fireplace, and numerous windows that allow in lots of natural light!
See the well-designed kitchen layout, with a breakfast bar, plenty of cabinetry and counterspace to utilize, fully equipped with refrigerator, electric range, microwave and dishwasher.
The primary bedroom is equipped with a ceiling fan,  walk-in closet, a full bathroom with single vanity, bathtub and access to a deck that leads to the backyard.
Amenities include a 2-car attached garage and the green tranquil surroundings enclosed in the community.
Tour and apply today before it's gone!!
All renters are enrolled in the resident benefits package
Do NOT reply to this ad, please call/text for a fast response.
Listed By: Benjamin Doherty, Sunroom Rentals Texas, LLC
